message: World War 3, A Multiplayer First-Person Shooter, Announced   "World War 3 is a multiplayer military FPS set in a modern, global conflict. Strong teamplay, national armed forces, real locations, full body awareness, and a versatile customization system all contribute to the authenticity of the modern combat experience enhanced by other essential elements such as a robust ballistic system, advanced armors and life-like weapons. Produced in cooperation with military R&D centers and consultants, World War 3 shows the consequences of every battle in the context of a global war campaign on a strategic war map."  World War 3 Teaser Trailer    Celoten trailer kmalu.
Multiplayer. 'nuff said.  Zakaj zaboga nas na vseh korakih posiljujejo z multiplayerjem ?
Brez veze, takih iger je kot smetja.
MP FAIL.

[D]emon je 26. maj 2018 ob 03:01 izjavil:Multiplayer. 'nuff said.  Zakaj zaboga nas na vseh korakih posiljujejo z multiplayerjem ?   Ker naj bi bila igra kao dalj časa aktivna oz. lahko potem developerji dalj časa molzejo igralce z dlc-ji in podobnim sranjem. Me ne bi niti presenetila kakšna zares kretenska fora, kot je recimo mesečna naročnina, da sploh lahko igraš.  #multiplayer2018
And that's how gaming dies.
I love the natural cycle.  90' singleplayer is awesome, multiplayer sucks; 00' multiplayer is awesome, single player is shit; 10' multiplayer sucks, single player is awesome
World War 3 is a new shooter that's something of a mix between Battlefield and battle royale       https://www.destructoid.com/world-war-3...
And still nobody cares.
WORLD WAR 3 - Official Reveal Trailer (New Tactical FPS War Game 2018)
Kaj niso počakali par let, takrat bo to relevantno
World War 3 - Artillery Strike Showcase

Generično. Pa modern setting je popolnoma bedn, ko enkrat spoznaš pravila sodobnega vojskovanja.   Ruski tanki bi žrli mavericke in helfire rakete od 100km daleč, na blizu pa Javeline in TOW.   Tisto na pehota vs pehota bi pol že lahko igrali kak post apocalyptic setting špil.

Sodobno vojskovanje sploh ne poteka na bojišču ampak v glavah ljudi. Evropo lahko sesuješ tako, da z nekaj tehnične opreme in arabskimi prevajalci narediš islamsko revolucijo, v ameriki pa podoben efekt narediš, da črnce z-agiziraš proti rasistični MAWA oblasti. Igro, ki bi ponujala takšen gameplay bi kupil in igral.

October 19 on Steam Early Access   World War 3 Official PC System Requirements   MINIMUM:  Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 GB available space    RECOMMENDED:  Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64), Windows 8 (x64), Windows 10 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 GB available space
Spet nekaj kar bo 3 leta v early access z mikro transakcijami?

Na Steamu  Please don't ruin this with Micro-Transactions  Muflex [developer]  No worries, there will be no microtransactions during early access. After full release we might introduce them but only for visuals and cosmetics with no effect on gameplay.  https://steamcommunity.com/app/674020/d...    World War 3 Game - NEW DETAILS! Free DLC! World War 3 technical issues plague early access launch, The Farm 51 working hard on fixes  It seems major connection issues have occurred since the game went live. One of the main problems on launch day was an endless loading screen. The studio deployed an update which addressed the issue.  The problem was "rooted in the login and authentication servers," not the actual game servers. The Farm 51 said it is continuing to work on mending connection issues and other problems as they arise, and will release small updates once fixed.  https://www.vg247.com/2018/10/20/world-...

Ni slabo :)  We are proud to announce that our newest title World War 3 has been a great sales success since its launch on Steam Early Access on Friday, with over 100,000 copies sold within the first 48 hours.   https://worthplaying.com/article/2018/1...
